entry.title: .Coconut Coir Pedicure Brush -(Self Care)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Almitra Sustainables
Type:
Price: 180.00

Introducing Coconut Coir Pedicure Brush!

Our Coconut Coir Pedicure Brush is one of that tools derived from the natural coconut coir fiber. When it comes to pedicure, exfoliation is must in order to remove the dead skin cells from your feet. Using a natural fiber bristle will aid in better exfoliation and keep toxicity at bay. This will also hydrate and keep the skin healthy.

With attention to detail we have kept the Coir bristles soft and they are specially hand combed for self care purpose. It’s suitable for both dry & wet usage (as it gives a good lather with soap). Ergonomically designed our pedicure brush is lightweight and easy to use.

This can be a go to when you need a natural and soulful pampering!

Size:
Brush Length – 9 cm

Brush width – 2 cm
Fiber length – 2.5 cm
*Material – Plant-Based, Handle: wood | bristle: Coconut Fiber
*Care – Rinse with mild soapy water and hang in the sun to dry.
*Packaging – We ensure that all our packaging is Eco-friendly

entry.title: .Coconut Bowl & Cutlery Set Combo
entry.summary:
Vendor: Almitra Sustainables
Type:
Price: 520.00

A perfect Combo for those Coconut lovers!

The lightweight rustic cutlery is naturally stylish and can make great companion when you are on the go! By using our Coconut cutlery, one can avoid tons of single-use plastic waste, promoting a plastic-free and healthy environment.

Our Coconut Bowls are made from coconuts which are discarded as waste after their juice and flesh has been used. The coconut shells are then thoroughly cleaned and cut to make Coconut Bowls which can be a great way to enjoy your early morning salads or rice bowls and much more.

Contains

1 * Coconut Bowl

1 × Spoon

1 × Fork

*Material – Coconut

*Care –

-Hand-wash with Luke Warm water and mild soap.

-Use Coconut Oil to rehydrate your Cutlery

*Note – Do not use in Microwave and Dishwasher.

*Disposal – Once it wears out, Compost it.

*Packaging – We ensure that all our packaging is eco-friendly

entry.title: Coconut Bowl Set of 4 | Eco-Friendly & Sustainable Kitchenware
entry.summary:
Vendor: Almitra Sustainables
Type:
Price: 1100.00

Sustainable Coconut Bowl Set – Pack of 4

Handcrafted Coconut Bowl Set – 100% Natural & Sustainable

Bring nature to your table with our Handcrafted Coconut Bowl Set, made from reclaimed coconut shells that would otherwise go to waste. Each bowl is carefully polished to preserve its natural texture and unique grain—making every piece one-of-a-kind.

Perfect for smoothie bowls, salads, snacks, or even as rustic home decor, these coconut bowls are the ideal blend of style, sustainability, and function.

Product Highlight:

  • Crafted from discarded coconut shells, giving them new life and reducing landfill waste.
  • Made by local artisans, ensuring ethical production and fair trade practices.
  • Free from chemicals, plastics, and artificial coatings—just 100% pure coconut shell.
  • Lightweight yet sturdy, with a smooth interior for hassle-free cleaning.

Care Tips:
Hand wash with lukewarm water and avoid dishwashers and microwaves to extend the life of your bowl.

entry.title: .Neem Comb - Pack of 2 (Small and Big)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Almitra Sustainables
Type:
Price: 450.00

Neem Wood Comb Set of 2 – Natural Hair Care for Every Hair Type

Nurture Your Scalp with Nature’s Touch

Discover the age-old wisdom of hair care with Almitra Sustainables’ Neem Wood Comb Pack, featuring a wide-tooth comb and a fine-tooth comb — perfect for all hair types and styling needs. Handcrafted from 100% natural neem wood, this duo not only detangles hair gently but also promotes healthy scalp circulation and minimizes static, breakage, and dandruff.

Neem is known for its antibacterial and antifungal properties, making this comb set a natural choice for a cleaner, healthier scalp. Unlike plastic combs, neem wood combs are biodegradable, non-toxic, and eco-friendly, making them an ideal swap for sustainable living.

Why You’ll Love It:

  • Two-in-One Combo: Includes one wide-tooth comb for detangling & one fine-tooth comb for styling
  • Natural Neem Wood: Known for antimicrobial benefits & scalp stimulation
  • Gentle on Hair: Reduces hair fall, static, and frizz
  • Plastic-Free & Sustainable: 100% biodegradable and zero-waste alternative
  • Handcrafted in India: Supporting local artisans & ethical production

Ideal For:

  • Daily hair care for men, women & children
  • Curly, wavy, straight & frizz-prone hair
  • Ayurvedic and chemical-free lifestyle seekers
  • Sustainable gifting

Upgrade your grooming essentials with this nature-inspired duo — because healthy hair starts with a conscious comb.

Coconut Fiber Bottle Cleaner & Vegetable Brush Set – Natural, Plastic-Free Cleaning Essentials

Eco-Friendly Cleaning Tools for a Conscious Kitchen

Bring nature into your everyday cleaning routine with Almitra Sustainables' Coconut Fiber Bottle & Vegetable Brush Set. Thoughtfully handcrafted from 100% natural coconut coir, this dual-purpose set includes a durable bottle cleaner and a curved vegetable scrubber – both designed to tackle tough grime without harming the planet.

Whether you're scrubbing root vegetables or deep-cleaning reusable bottles, these biodegradable brushes offer a non-toxic, plastic-free alternative to synthetic cleaning tools. The sturdy coir bristles are tough on dirt yet gentle on surfaces, making them ideal for kitchens committed to sustainability.

Key Features:

  • Made from natural coconut fiber (coir)
  • Fully biodegradable and compostable
  • Perfect for bottles, jars, and glassware
  • Great for scrubbing vegetables and produce
  • Ergonomic and easy to grip
  • Plastic-free and non-toxic
  • Ethically handmade in India

Upgrade your zero-waste lifestyle with this eco-conscious kitchen essential – because clean living starts with cleaner choices.
